verses.verse: "Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> of them rods, <S%H4294><s%> one for each fathers <S%H1><s%>' house, <S%H1004><s%> of all their princes <S%H5387><s%> according to their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> rods: <S%H4294><s%> write <S%H3789><s%> every man <S%H376><s%>'s name <S%H8034><s%> on his rod. <S%H4294><s%>

You shall write <S%H3789><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s name <S%H8034><s%> on the rod <S%H4294><s%> of Levi; <S%H3878><s%> for there shall be one <S%H259><s%> rod <S%H4294><s%> for each head <S%H7218><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses. <S%H1004><s%>
You shall lay them up <S%H3240><s%> in the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting <S%H4150><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the testimony, <S%H5715><s%> where I meet with you. <S%H3259><s%>

It shall happen, <S%H4294><s%> that the rod of the man <S%H376><s%> whom I shall choose <S%H977><s%> shall bud: <S%H6524><s%> and I will make to cease <S%H7918><s%> from me the murmurings <S%H8519><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> which they murmur against you. <S%H3885><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and all their princes <S%H5387><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> him rods, <S%H4294><s%> for each prince <S%H5387><s%> one, <S%H259><s%> according to their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%> even twelve <S%H6240><s%> rods: <S%H4294><s%> and the rod <S%H4294><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> was among <S%H8432><s%> their rods. <S%H4294><s%>
Moses <S%H4872><s%> laid up <S%H3240><s%> the rods <S%H4294><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of the testimony. <S%H5715><s%>

It happened on the next day, <S%H4283><s%> that Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H935><s%> into the tent <S%H168><s%> of the testimony; <S%H5715><s%> and behold, <S%H4294><s%> the rod of Aaron <S%H175><s%> for the house <S%H1004><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> was budded, <S%H6524><s%> and put forth <S%H3318><s%> buds, <S%H6525><s%> and produced <S%H6692><s%> blossoms, <S%H6731><s%> and bore <S%H1580><s%> ripe almonds. <S%H8247><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> brought out <S%H3318><s%> all the rods <S%H4294><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> to all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> and they looked, <S%H7200><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his rod. <S%H4294><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Put <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> the rod <S%H4294><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the testimony, <S%H5715><s%> to be kept <S%H4931><s%> for a token <S%H226><s%> against the children of rebellion; <S%H4805><s%> that you may make an end <S%H3615><s%> of their murmurings <S%H8519><s%> against me, <S%H4191><s%> that they not die."
Moses <S%H4872><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so. <S%H3068><s%> As Yahweh commanded <S%H6680><s%> him, <S%H6213><s%> so he did.

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H1478><s%> we perish! We are undone! <S%H6><s%> We are all undone! <S%H6><s%>
Everyone who comes near, <S%H7131><s%> who comes near to the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> dies! <S%H4191><s%> Will we all <S%H8552><s%> perish? <S%H1478><s%>"
